Listado de Series

ID Nombre Canal Temporadas
{{serie.id}} {{serie.name}} {{serie.platform}} {{serie.seasonsNumber}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Serie } from '../serie'; import { SeriesService } from '../series.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-listar-series', templateUrl: './listar-series.component.html', styleUrls: ['./listar-series.component.css'] }) export class ListarSeriesComponent implements OnInit { series: Serie[] = []; constructor(private seriesService: SeriesService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.seriesService.getSeries().subscribe((data: Serie[]) => { this.series = data; }); } }
